tags.name: Try the API
tags.description: To try the API [you can use the swagger UI](/documentation-technique/try)

tags.name: Training
tags.description: List of operations on apprenticeship training

tags.name: Experimental
tags.description: List of experimental routes. Warning: these routes may change without notice.

api-key.description: API key to provide in the `Authorization` header. If the route requires a particular authorization, please contact support to request it at [support_api@apprentissage.beta.gouv.fr](mailto:support_api@apprentissage.beta.gouv.fr)

cfd.description:
Code Formation Diplôme (CFD) de la certification.

Notes:

- `null` si et seulement si aucun diplôme CFD correspondant à la fiche RNCP (`identifiant.rncp`) n'est connu.
- Lorsque le code est `null`, toutes les informations issues de la base centrale des nomenclatures (BCN) seront `null`

rncp.description:
Code Répertoire National des Certifications Professionnelles (RNCP) de la certification.

Notes:

- `null` si et seulement si aucune fiche RNCP correspondant au diplôme (`identifiant.cfd`) n'est connu.
- Lorsque le code est `null`, toutes les informations issues de France Compétence seront `null`

rncp_anterieur_2019.description:
Identifie les certifications dont le code RNCP correspond à une fiche antérieure à la réforme de 2019.

Notes:

- `null` si `identifiant.rncp` est `null`
- `true` si le numéro de fiche `identifiant.rncp` est inférieur à `34,000`
- `false` sinon

identifiant.description: les fiches RNCP antérieures à la réforme de 2019 ont certaines données qui ne sont pas renseignées, elles sont identifiées par le champ `rncp_anterieur_2019` à `true`.

cfd.description:
Intitulés de la certification issue de la base centrale des nomenclatures (BCN).

Notes:

- `null` lorsque le champs `identifiant.cfd` est `null`.

europeen.description:
Niveau de qualification de la certification (de 1 à 8) utilisés dans les référentiels nationaux européens.

Notes:

- peut être `null` lorsque le niveau de diplôme n'a pas de correspondance avec les niveaux européens ou qu'elle n'est pas déterminée.
- lorsque la fiche RNCP correspondante est connue, il faut priviliégier le niveau européen issue de France Compétences.

formation_diplome.description:
Code à 3 caractères qui renseigne sur le niveau du diplôme suivant le référentiel de l'Éducation Nationale.

Notes:

- correspond aux 3 premiers caractères du code CFD.

interministeriel.description:
code interministériel du niveau de la formation suivant le référentiel de l'Éducation Nationale.

Notes:

- correspond au premier caractère du code CFD, sauf pour le CFD `01321401`

cfd.description:
Niveau de la certification issue de la base centrale des nomenclatures (BCN).

Notes:

- `null` lorsque le champs `identifiant.cfd` est `null`.

europeen.description:
Niveau de qualification de la certification (de 1 à 8) utilisés dans les référentiels nationaux européens.

Notes:

- `null` lorsque le niveau de diplôme n'a pas de correspondance avec les niveaux européens.

rncp.description:
Niveau de qualification issue de France Compétences.

Notes:

- `null` lorsque le champs `identifiant.rncp` est `null`.

niveau.description: Niveau de qualification de la certification professionnelle

rncp.description:
Intitulé de la certification issue de France Compétences.

Notes:

- `null` lorsque le champs `identifiant.rncp` est `null`.

creation.description:
Date d'arrêté de création du diplôme.

Notes:

- La base centrale des nomenclatures (BCN) fournie cette date sans l'information de l'heure, nous interprétons arbitrairement l'heure à '00:00:00' sur le fuseau horaire 'Europe/Paris'.
- La date est retournée au format ISO 8601 avec le fuseau horaire 'Europe/Paris'.

abrogation.description:
Date d'arrêté d'abrogation du diplôme.

Notes:

- La base centrale des nomenclatures (BCN) fournie cette date sans l'information de l'heure, nous interprétons arbitrairement l'heure à '23:59:59' sur le fuseau horaire 'Europe/Paris'.
- La date est retournée au format ISO 8601 avec le fuseau horaire 'Europe/Paris'.

anyOf.description:
Informations légales issue de la base centrale des nomenclatures (BCN) relatives au diplôme.

Notes:

- `null` lorsque le champs `identifiant.cfd` est `null`.

base_legale.description: Dates de création et d’abrogation des diplômes crées par arrêtés

examples: Approvisionnement, communication, sécurité alimentaire et hygiène en boulangerie

rncp.description:
Liste des blocs de compétences issue de France Compétences.

Notes:

- `null` lorsque le champs `identifiant.rncp` est `null`.

blocs_competences.description: Liste du (ou des) code (s) et intitulé(s) des blocs de compétences validés par la certification

examples: Bâtiment (Employés, techniciens et agents de maîtrise, ingénieurs, assimilés et cadres)

rncp.description:
Liste des conventions collectives issue de France Compétences.

Notes:

- `null` lorsque le champs `identifiant.rncp` est `null`.

convention_collectives.description: Liste(s) de la ou des convention(s) collective(s) rattachées à la certification

rncp.description:
Formacode® issue de France Compétences.

Notes:

- `null` lorsque le champs `identifiant.rncp` est `null`.

formacodes.description:
Formacode® issue de France Compétences.

Notes:

- `null` lorsque le champs `identifiant.rncp` est `null`.

cfd.description:
NSF issue de la base centrale des nomenclatures (BCN).

Notes:

- `null` lorsque le champs `identifiant.cfd` est `null`.
- Le code NSF est déduis du code formation diplôme (CFD), il n'inclut donc pas la lettre de spécialité et le tableau ne contient qu'un seul élément.

rncp.description:
NSF issue de France Compétences.

Notes:

- `null` lorsque le champs `identifiant.rncp` est `null`.

ROME issue de France Compétences.

Notes:

- `null` lorsque le champs `identifiant.rncp` est `null`.

rome.description: Répertoire Opérationnel des Métiers et des Emplois (ROME).

debut.description:
Date de début de validité de la certification. Cette date correspond à l'intersection de la date d'ouverture du diplôme et de la date d'activation de la fiche RNCP.

Notes:

- La couverture de ce champ est partiel car nous ne sommes pas en mesure pour le moment de récupérer les dates d'activation antérieures au 24 décembre 2021.

fin.description: Date de fin de validité de la certification. Cette date correspond à l'intersection de la date de fermeture du diplôme et de la date de fin d'enregistrement.

ouverture.description:
Date d'ouverture du diplôme.

Notes:

- La base centrale des nomenclatures (BCN) fournie cette date sans l'information de l'heure, nous interprétons arbitrairement l'heure à '00:00:00' sur le fuseau horaire 'Europe/Paris'.

fermeture.description:
Date de fermeture du diplôme.

Notes:

- La base centrale des nomenclatures (BCN) fournie cette date sans l'information de l'heure, nous interprétons arbitrairement l'heure à '23:59:59' sur le fuseau horaire 'Europe/Paris'.

premiere_session.description: Année de sortie des premiers diplômés.

derniere_session.description: Année de sortie des derniers diplômés.

actif.description: Lorsque la fiche est active, les inscriptions à la formation sont ouvertes, à l’inverse, lorsque la fiche est inactive, les inscriptions sont fermées.

activation.description:
Date à laquelle la fiche RNCP est passée au statut `actif`.

Notes:

- La couverture de ce champ est partiel car nous ne sommes pas en mesure pour le moment de récupérer les dates d'activation antérieures au 24 décembre 2021.
- France Compétence ne fournie pas l'information, nous le déduisons de la date de premiere apparation de la fiche RNCP avec le statut `actif`.

debut_parcours.description:
Date de début des parcours certifiants. Anciennement appelée 'date d'effet' pour les enregistrements de droit et correspondant à la date de décision pour les enregistrements sur demande.

Notes:

La date est retournée au format ISO 8601 avec le fuseau horaire Europe/Paris.

fin_enregistrement.description:
Date de fin d’enregistrement d’une fiche au RNCP.

Notes:

- France Compétence fournie cette date sans l'information de l'heure, nous interprétons arbitrairement l'heure à '23:59:59' sur le fuseau horaire 'Europe/Paris'.

periode_validite.description:
**Un couple CFD-RNCP a une période de validité** qui correspond à l’intersection de la période d’ouverture du diplôme et de la période d’activité de la fiche RNCP.

Notes:

Les dates sont retournées au format ISO 8601 avec le fuseau horaire Europe/Paris.

cfd.description:
Nature du diplôme issue de la base centrale des nomenclatures (BCN).

Notes:

- `null` lorsque le champs `identifiant.cfd` est `null`.

gestionnaire_diplome.description:
Service responsable de la définition du diplôme.

Notes:

- `null` lorsque le champs `identifiant.cfd` est `null`.

enregistrement_rncp.description:
Permet de savoir si la certification est enregistrée de droit ou sur demande au Repertoire National des Certifications Professionnelles (RNCP)

- `null` lorsque le champs `identifiant.rncp` est `null`.

contrat_professionnalisation.description: Certification accessible en contrat de professionnalisation.

formation_continue.description: Certification accessible après un parcours de formation continue.

formation_statut_eleve.description: Certification accessible après un parcours de formation sous statut d’élève ou d’étudiant.

rncp.description:
Voie d’accès à la certification issue de France Compétences.

Notes:

- `null` lorsque le champs `identifiant.rncp` est `null`.

siret.description: Numéro SIRET du certificateur renseigné dans le RNCP.

nom.description: Nom du certificateur renseigné dans le RNCP.

certificateurs_rncp.description:
Liste des certificateurs de la fiche RNCP.

Notes:

- `null` lorsque le champs `identifiant.rncp` est `null`.

ouverture.description:
Date d'ouverture du diplôme.

Notes:

- La base centrale des nomenclatures (BCN) fournie cette date sans l'information de l'heure, nous interprétons arbitrairement l'heure à '00:00:00' sur le fuseau horaire 'Europe/Paris'.

fermeture.description:
Date de fermeture du diplôme.

Notes:

- La base centrale des nomenclatures (BCN) fournie cette date sans l'information de l'heure, nous interprétons arbitrairement l'heure à '23:59:59' sur le fuseau horaire 'Europe/Paris'.

courant.description: Indique si le diplôme correspond au diplôme courant, i.e `identifiant.cfd` est égal au `code`.

cfd.description:
Liste des diplômes assurant la continuité du diplôme. La liste inclut à la fois les diplômes remplacés et remplaçant. La liste est ordonnée par date d'ouverture du diplôme et inclut le diplôme courant.

Notes:

- `null` lorsque le champs `identifiant.cfd` est `null`.
- Pour distinguer les diplômes remplacés des diplômes remplaçant, il faut se référer aux dates d'ouverture et de fermeture des diplômes.

activation.description:
Date à laquelle la fiche RNCP est passée au statut `actif`.

Notes:

- La couverture de ce champ est partiel car nous ne sommes pas en mesure pour le moment de récupérer les dates d'activation antérieures au 24 décembre 2021.

- France Compétence ne fournie pas l'information, nous le déduisons de la date de premiere apparation de la fiche RNCP avec le statut `actif`.

fin_enregistrement.description:
Date de fin d’enregistrement d’une fiche au RNCP.

Notes:

- France Compétence fournie cette date sans l'information de l'heure, nous interprétons arbitrairement l'heure à '23:59:59' sur le fuseau horaire 'Europe/Paris'.

code.description: Indique si la fiche correspond à la fiche courante, i.e `identifiant.rncp` est égal au `code`.

actif.description: Lorsque la fiche est active, les inscriptions à la formation sont ouvertes, à l’inverse, lorsque la fiche est inactive, les inscriptions sont fermées.

rncp.description:
- `null` lorsque le champs `identifiant.rncp` est `null`.
- Pour distinguer les fiches remplacées des fiches remplaçant, il faut se référer aux dates d'activation et de fin d'enregistrement des fiches.

continuite.description: **Liste des couples CFD-RNCP assurant la continuité de la certification professionnelle.** La liste inclut à la fois les fiches remplacées et remplaçantes. Elle est ordonnée par date d'activation de la fiche RNCP et inclut la fiche courante.

postaux.description: List of postal codes of the municipality

code.description:
INSEE and postal codes of the municipality

A municipality can have multiple postal codes, and a postal code can correspond to multiple municipalities. The INSEE code is unique for each municipality.

codeInsee.description: INSEE code of the former municipality

localisation.description:
The location information consists of:

- The `center` of the municipality
- The bounding box (`bbox`) that defines the area of the municipality.

The `center` and `bbox` fields are both in [GeoJSON](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/GeoJSON) format.

identifier.description:
This element includes:

- the partner responsible for the job offer
- the unique identifier of the job offer within the "La bonne alternance" information system

name.description:
Name of the establishment (brand name or, failing that, legal name) or school legal name if is_delegated = true

In the case of publishing a job offer, it is possible to use a custom name; otherwise, it will take the value of the brand name, or failing that, the legal name.

description.description: Description of the employer and/or the department where the contract will be carried out.
examples: Service du Premier ministre, placé sous l’autorité du ministre de la Transformation et de la Fonction publiques, la direction interministérielle du numérique (DINUM) a pour mission d’élaborer la stratégie numérique de l’État et de piloter sa mise en œuvre. Notre objectif : un État plus efficace, plus simple et plus souverain grâce au numérique.

siret.description: SIRET of the contract execution location or of the school if is_delegated = true

address.description: Postal address of the job offer location or of the school if is_delegated = true.

location.description: Postal address and geolocation linked to the company's SIRET number

legal_name.description: Company legal name or school legal name if is_delegated = true

size.description: Company workforce range, in number of employees

idcc.description: Collective agreement number associated with the SIRET number

opco.description: Competency Operator (OPCO) associated with the SIRET number

code.description: NAF code (sector of activity) associated with the SIRET number

label.description: Label of the NAF code (sector of activity) associated with the SIRET number

naf.description: NAF (sector of activity) associated with the SIRET number

domain.description:
Groups elements that describe the field to which the company's SIRET number is linked:

The French Classification of Activities (NAF). Produced by INSEE, its aim is to facilitate the organization of economic and social information.
The IDCC number of the collective agreement. Produced by the ministry responsible for labor (Dares and DGT) and the one responsible for agriculture.
The Competency Operator (OPCO) responsible for managing the funding of the contract.

workplace.description:
Workplace is described by :

- The name (brand name or, failing that, the company name) and the SIRET number of the company.
- The description of the employer and/or the department where the contract will be carried out.
- The company's workforce range, in terms of the number of employees.
- The company's website.

phone.description:
Recruiter's phone number or School phone number if is_delegated is true

Only European phone numbers are allowed. There is also a check on the nature of the number: only mobile and landline phones are allowed.

url.description: Redirect URL to the application form

recipient_id.description: Identifier to use for applying to the job offer using /v3/jobs/apply route or to display the apply /postuler widget. If null applying is not available for this offer by apply_route nor by /postuler widget.

apply.description:
This element groups the different means of application offered to candidates.

- URL to redirect the candidate to apply
- Phone number of the person in charge of recruitment
- Identifier of the job opportunity to use to allow your users to apply directly from your site using [this additional API](./candidature-offre).

partner_job_id.description: Offer identifier within the partner's information system.

id.description:
Identifier of the job offer in the La bonne alternance database.

France Travail offers are not stored in the La bonne alternance database but are retrieved on the fly. They do not have an identifier in the database.

partner_label.description:
Partner originating the job offer. In the case of offers collected by La Bonne Alternance, the partner_label is: "offres_emploi_lba".
In the case of companies identified with a high potential to recruit, the partner_label is: "recruteurs_lba".

identifier.description:
This element includes:

- the partner responsible for the job offer
- the unique identifier of the job offer within the "La bonne alternance" information system

name.description:
Name of the establishment (brand name or, failing that, legal name) or school legal name if is_delegated = true

In the case of publishing a job offer, it is possible to use a custom name; otherwise, it will take the value of the brand name, or failing that, the legal name.

description.description: Description of the employer and/or the department where the contract will be carried out.
examples: Service du Premier ministre, placé sous l’autorité du ministre de la Transformation et de la Fonction publiques, la direction interministérielle du numérique (DINUM) a pour mission d’élaborer la stratégie numérique de l’État et de piloter sa mise en œuvre. Notre objectif : un État plus efficace, plus simple et plus souverain grâce au numérique.

siret.description: SIRET of the contract execution location or of the school if is_delegated = true

address.description: Postal address of the job offer location or of the school if is_delegated = true.

location.description: Postal address and geolocation linked to the company's SIRET number

legal_name.description: Company legal name or school legal name if is_delegated = true

size.description: Company workforce range, in number of employees

idcc.description: Collective agreement number associated with the SIRET number

opco.description: Competency Operator (OPCO) associated with the SIRET number

code.description: NAF code (sector of activity) associated with the SIRET number

label.description: Label of the NAF code (sector of activity) associated with the SIRET number

naf.description: NAF (sector of activity) associated with the SIRET number

domain.description:
Groups elements that describe the field to which the company's SIRET number is linked:

The French Classification of Activities (NAF). Produced by INSEE, its aim is to facilitate the organization of economic and social information.
The IDCC number of the collective agreement. Produced by the ministry responsible for labor (Dares and DGT) and the one responsible for agriculture.
The Competency Operator (OPCO) responsible for managing the funding of the contract.

workplace.description:
Workplace is described by :

- The name (brand name or, failing that, the company name) and the SIRET number of the company.
- The description of the employer and/or the department where the contract will be carried out.
- The company's workforce range, in terms of the number of employees.
- The company's website.

phone.description:
Recruiter's phone number or School phone number if is_delegated is true

Only European phone numbers are allowed. There is also a check on the nature of the number: only mobile and landline phones are allowed.

url.description: Redirect URL to the application form

recipient_id.description: Identifier to use for applying to the job offer using /v3/jobs/apply route or to display the apply /postuler widget. If null applying is not available for this offer by apply_route nor by /postuler widget.

apply.description:
This element groups the different means of application offered to candidates.

- URL to redirect the candidate to apply
- Phone number of the person in charge of recruitment
- Identifier of the job opportunity to use to allow your users to apply directly from your site using [this additional API](./candidature-offre).

contract.description:
Un contrat est décrit par :

- Le type (apprentissage et/ou professionnalisation).
- La date de début.
- La durée.
- Le mode de travail (présentiel, télétravail ou hybride).

items.description: The skills or qualities expected for the position.
examples: Faire preuve de rigueur et de précision

desired_skills.description: The skills or qualities expected for the position.

items.description: The skills or qualities to be acquired during the apprenticeship.
examples: Recherche, Innovation : Analyser les indicateurs pertinents sur les tendances et les usages des clients
Recherche, Innovation : Concevoir et développer une solution digitale
Nouvelles technologies : Assembler des composants logiciels

to_be_acquired_skills.description: The skills or qualities to be acquired during the apprenticeship.

items.description: The conditions for entering the profession
examples: Ce métier est accessible avec un diplôme de niveau Bac+2 (BTS, DUT) à Master (MIAGE, diplôme d'ingénieur, Master professionnel, ...) en informatique.
Il est également accessible avec une expérience professionnelle en informatique, système d'exploitation ou dans un domaine applicatif.
La pratique de l'anglais (vocabulaire technique) est requise.

access_conditions.description: The conditions for entering the profession

opening_count.description: Number of positions available for this job offer

creation.description: Creation date of the job opportunity.

expiration.description: Expiration date of the job opportunity.

publication.description: A job opportunity has a life cycle: a creation date and an expiration date.

examples: Conçoit, développe et met au point un projet d'application informatique, de la phase d'étude à son intégration, pour un client ou une entreprise selon des besoins fonctionnels et un cahier des charges. Peut conduire des projets de développement. Peut coordonner une équipe.

european.description: Targeted diploma level at the end of studies.

label.description: The title of the targeted diploma level at the end of studies.

target_diploma.description: Targeted diploma level at the end of studies.

status.description:
The status of the offer (life cycle):

- Active: The offer is available on the platform, and applications are open.
- Filled: The offer has been filled and is no longer available.
- Cancelled: The offer has been canceled and is no longer available.

Only active offers are returned by the search.

offer.description:
A job offer is described by:

- The title. Example: Web Developer.
- The description. Example: Designs, develops, and implements a software application project, from the study phase to its integration, for a client or company, according to functional needs and specifications. May lead development projects. May coordinate a team.
- The targeted diploma level. Example: BP, Bac, other level (Bac) qualifications.
- The skills or qualities expected for the position. Example: Demonstrate autonomy; Show creativity and inventiveness; Display rigor and precision; Work well in a team.
- The skills or qualities to be acquired during the apprenticeship. Example: Research, Innovation (Analyze relevant indicators on trends and customer usage; Design and develop a digital solution; Create technical documentation). New technologies (Assemble software components; Design a web application).
- The conditions for entering the profession. Example: This profession is accessible with a degree from Bac+2 (BTS, DUT) to Master (MIAGE, engineering degree, professional Master, etc.) in computer science. It is also accessible with professional experience in computer science, operating systems, or an application domain. Proficiency in English (technical vocabulary) is required.
- The number of positions to be filled.
- List of ROME codes associated to the offer.

is_delegated.description: true if offer management is delegated to a partner school. false otherwise

status.description: State of the publishing. If the value is WILL_NOT_BE_PUBLISHED, the offer will not be published.

code.description: Code of the error. This code will not change.

url.description:
URL of the export. Provided URL is valid for 2 minutes. 

Offers are returned using the JSON format. The data structure of the offers is identical to the response of the [search route](/fr/documentation-technique#tag/Offre-Emploi/operation/jobSearch)

JobOfferExport.description: Informations relative to the export of the all the offers.

name.description:
Name of the establishment (brand name or, failing that, legal name) or school legal name if is_delegated = true

In the case of publishing a job offer, it is possible to use a custom name; otherwise, it will take the value of the brand name, or failing that, the legal name.

    `, `
  • `. Any other tags or attributes will be removed during validation.
examples: Service du Premier ministre, placé sous l’autorité du ministre de la Transformation et de la Fonction publiques, la direction interministérielle du numérique (DINUM) a pour mission d’élaborer la stratégie numérique de l’État et de piloter sa mise en œuvre. Notre objectif : un État plus efficace, plus simple et plus souverain grâce au numérique.

siret.description:
SIRET of the contract execution location

The information `brand` `legal_name` `size` `idcc` `opco` `naf` is automatically deduced from the SIRET.

address.description:
Address of the job offer

In the case of job offer publication, a custom address can be provided; otherwise, the establishment's address will be used.

The geopoint field is derived from the address.

location.description: Postal address and geolocation linked to the company's SIRET number

workplace.description:
Workplace is described by :

- The name (brand name or, failing that, the company name) and the SIRET number of the company.
- The description of the employer and/or the department where the contract will be carried out.
- The company's workforce range, in terms of the number of employees.
- The company's website.

phone.description:
Recruiter's phone number or School phone number if is_delegated is true

Only European phone numbers are allowed. There is also a check on the nature of the number: only mobile and landline phones are allowed.

apply.description:
Elements for submitting an application:

- Redirect URL
- Phone number
- Company email

- La date de début.
- La durée.
- Le mode de travail (présentiel, télétravail ou hybride).

    `, `
  • `. Any other tags or attributes will be removed during validation.
examples: Conçoit, développe et met au point un projet d'application informatique, de la phase d'étude à son intégration, pour un client ou une entreprise selon des besoins fonctionnels et un cahier des charges. Peut conduire des projets de développement. Peut coordonner une équipe.

rome_codes.description:
ROME code(s) of the offer

If the published offer does not have a ROME code provided, we deduce the ROME codes from the job offer title.

european.description: Targeted diploma level at the end of studies.

target_diploma.description: Targeted diploma level at the end of studies.

creation.description: Creation date of the job opportunity.

expiration.description: Expiration date of the job opportunity.

publication.description: A job opportunity has a life cycle: a creation date and an expiration date.

multicast.description: If the offer can be broadcast on all partner platforms

origin.description: Origin of the offer from an aggregator

status.description:
The status of the offer (life cycle):

- Active: The offer is available on the platform, and applications are open.
- Filled: The offer has been filled and is no longer available.
- Cancelled: The offer has been canceled and is no longer available.

Only active offers are returned by the search.

When creating an offer, only active offers are accepted. However, during an update, it is possible to cancel or mark an offer as filled.

offer.description:
A job offer is described by:

- The title. Example: Web Developer.
- The description. Example: Designs, develops, and implements a software application project, from the study phase to its integration, for a client or company, according to functional needs and specifications. May lead development projects. May coordinate a team.
- The targeted diploma level. Example: BP, Bac, other level (Bac) qualifications.
- The skills or qualities expected for the position. Example: Demonstrate autonomy; Show creativity and inventiveness; Display rigor and precision; Work well in a team.
- The skills or qualities to be acquired during the apprenticeship. Example: Research, Innovation (Analyze relevant indicators on trends and customer usage; Design and develop a digital solution; Create technical documentation). New technologies (Assemble software components; Design a web application).
- The conditions for entering the profession. Example: This profession is accessible with a degree from Bac+2 (BTS, DUT) to Master (MIAGE, engineering degree, professional Master, etc.) in computer science. It is also accessible with professional experience in computer science, operating systems, or an application domain. Proficiency in English (technical vocabulary) is required.
- The number of positions to be filled.
- List of ROME codes associated to the offer.

recipient_id.description: Recipient identifier retrieved from `apply.recipient_id` from search route.

cle_ministere_educatif.description: Unique identifier to identify a training on [the apprenticeship training catalog](https://catalogue-apprentissage.intercariforef.org/recherche/formations)

connu.description:
Indicates if the trainer is known to the API

The organization is known when it is present in [the training organizations repository](https://referentiel.apprentissage.onisep.fr/organismes) or if it has been in the past.

It can be an organization that is no longer on the training organizations repository. Please check the status of the organization.

formateur.description:
Training trainer

The training organization is responsible for providing the training

connu.description:
Indicates if the manager is known to the API

The organization is known when it is present in [the training organizations repository](https://referentiel.apprentissage.onisep.fr/organismes) or if it has been in the past.

responsable.description:
Training manager

The training manager is the organization that has the administrative responsibility for the training

It can be an organization that is no longer on the training organizations repository. Please check the status of the organization.

connue.description:
When the certification is known, then the certification is available in the certifications API

Otherwise, the certification is built from the information from the RNCP and the CFD independently.

precision.description:
Geolocation accuracy of the training location in meters.

This is the distance between the geolocated point and the location deduced from the address

lieu.description: Place where the training is given

contact.description: Contact information to use to contact the organism

onisep.description: Information related to the training from the ONISEP

entierement_a_distance.description: Indicates if the training is entirely remote

annee_cycle.description: The start year of the training session.

referentiel.description: Organism's status in the training organizations repository

confirmation_referentiel.description: Indicates if the contact has a "confirmed" status on the training organizations repository

Longitude of the GPS coordinate of the search area.

The search will cover the whole of France if not specified.

This field must be mandatory when used with the longitude field.

Latitude of the GPS coordinate of the search area.

The search will cover the entire France if not specified.

This field should be mandatory when used with the longitude field.
Search radius in km, useful if a latitude and longitude are provided. The value must be between 0 and 200 and will default to 30.

Target diploma level at the end of studies.

When filtering by diploma level, we return data :

- where the target diploma level is unknown / not specified / indifferent
- **and** where the target diploma level matches the requested diploma level

By filtering on `4`, only data related to this diploma level, as well as those with unknown/unspecified levels, will be returned to you.

ROME code(s) for the research scope

The ROME corresponds to the Operational Reference for Trades and Jobs designed by France Travail.

List of codes separated by commas

The codes must adhere to the ROME formats

RNCP code of the research scope

The RNCP corresponds to the National Directory of Professional Certifications by [France Compétences](https://www.francecompetences.fr/reguler-le-marche/certification-professionnelle/)

enum: AKTO / Opco entreprises et salariés des services à forte intensité de main d'oeuvre
Uniformation, l'Opco de la Cohésion sociale
schema.description: Allow filtering job offers by opco name.
Allow filtering job offers by department numbers. This parameter accepts an array of department numbers

List of partners labels to exclude from the search.
This list changes regularly. The updated list is available [at this url](http://labonnealternance.apprentissage.beta.gouv.fr/metabase/public/question/70f84c13-6156-4933-9fb3-54c88887d95d)

jobs.description:
List of job offers corresponding to the search.

The offers come from:

- collection on the platform La bonne alternance
- France Travail
- publication via API by our partners

Currently, the results are sorted by:

- Source priority (La bonne alternance > France Travail > other partners)
- Increasing distance (only for a search by location)
- Decreasing date of creation

The results are limited to 150 for each of the three sources i.e. 450 maximum results, and currently, it is not possible to retrieve all the offers matching the search criteria.

recruiters.description:
List of companies that have not posted a job offer but are likely to hire apprentices in the desired field.

The results are limited to 150, and currently, it is not possible to retrieve all recruiters matching the search criteria.

warnings.description: List of warnings related to the search.

get.description: Access in real-time all apprenticeship job opportunities available in France and offer them to your users for free and under a white-label format.

post.description:
This API allows you to maximize the visibility of your apprenticeship job offers by sharing them with the La bonne alternance service, which then automatically redistributes them to the most relevant candidates on its site as well as its partner sites.

Limit: 1 call per second

schema.description: Unique identifier of the job offer

put.summary: Modify an apprenticeship job offer. Offer must be published and active
put.description: This API allows you to maximize the visibility of your apprenticeship job offers by sharing them with the service La bonne alternance, which then automatically distributes them closer to candidates on its site and its partner sites.

schema.description: Unique identifier of the job offer

get.description: Access the details of an apprenticeship job offer from its identifier.

schema.description: Unique identifier of the job offer

get.summary: State of the last publishing of the offer
get.description: This endpoint gives informations about the state of the last publishing of the offer. Indeed, the publishing of an offer can take up to 10 minutes.

post.summary: Send an application to a job opportunity in apprenticeship
post.description:
To streamline your users' journey, this API allows you to directly transmit your users' applications to recruiters without them having to leave your site.

For this, it only requires the transmission of the candidate's contact information and resume. A cover letter, addressed to the recruiter, can also be optionally submitted. The application is then sent to the recruiter via email.

get.description:
Displays all job offers.
Offers are updated once a day at 3 AM Paris time.

schema.description:
Filter the list of certifications by `identifiant.cfd`

- If the value is empty or `null`, filter with `identifiant.cfd = null`

- If the value is absent, no filter is applied

- Otherwise must match the regex `/^[A-Z0-9]{3}\d{3}[A-Z0-9]{2}$/`

Filter the list of certifications by `identifiant.rncp`

- If the value is empty or `null`, filter with `identifiant.rncp = null`

- If the value is absent, no filter is applied

- Otherwise must match the regex `/^RNCP\d{3,5}$/`
List of communes matching the INSEE or postal code searched

get.description: Retrieve the list of certifications, filtered by `identifiant.cfd` and `identifiant.rncp`

schema.description: INSEE or postal code searched
List of communes matching the INSEE or postal code searched

get.description: Search for municipalities by INSEE or postal code. Searching by INSEE code also includes merged municipalities (delegated or associated) and municipal districts. Please note that a single postal code may be associated with multiple municipalities, and a municipality may have multiple postal codes.

schema.description: List of French departments

get.description: Retrieve French departments, for practical reasons the overseas collectivities and territories are included and assimilated to departments
